name: Five Nights At Bear's Baby Sitting
name_original: Five Nights At Bear's Baby Sitting
description:
Welcome To Five Nights At Bear's Baby Sitting  (click for everything)

You have taken a job offer at a sketchy baby sitting office as a security guard while there is man killing animatronics are on the loose!

Introducing Harlow (the special one) he appears after you take down your camera (not always) and to get rid of him you press the red and blue square located on his chest

Introducing Zippy (vent boy) he's in the vent and when he's close he will tell you (he'll also tell you when he leaves)

Introducing Stuffs, Polly, and Skid, all of them can be seen in the camera Stuff's gos to the left door while Polly and Skid go to the right one
